ygData.subject: Re: A tale of woe [OT]
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Grey Wolves in the Qeynos hills rarely drop High Quality wolf _skins_ rather than pelts. But according to EQ_Tailors, they can be used to make reinforced.
ygData.messageBody:
> Heh heh, I'm with ya in spirit man! I'd say though that tailors too would
> dearly love to find a source of HQ wolf pelts to outfit all those halfling
> druids with reinforced leather. I've seen one in all my lifetimes!

Grey Wolves in the Qeynos hills rarely drop High Quality wolf _skins_ rather
than pelts.
But according to EQ_Tailors, they can be used to make reinforced.
